title: creating-posts
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
In distill, blog posts must be knit intentionally and separately from the rest of the webpage. In VS code this must be done using rmarkdown::render("./path-to-file"). The relative path of the file is accessible through right-clicking the file.
To create a new post, use distill::create_post("name")
It will also be useful to set up my own template: https://www.ericekholm.com/posts/2021-04-02-personalizing-the-distill-template/
